inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed non-small cell cancer by biopsy or cytology.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Squamous cell carcinoma, adenocarcinoma, large cell carcinoma, bronchioalveolar carcinoma, or non-small cell carcinoma (not otherwise specified) are allowed.

inclusion.criterion: Staging studies must identify patient as AJCC Stage I or II based on only 1 of following combinations of TNM staging.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Primary tumor must be arising in one of the following central chest locations.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must use effective contraception.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No direct evidence of regional or distant metastases after appropriate staging studies.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No synchronous primary or prior malignancy in past 2 years except non-melanoma skin cancer or in situ cancer.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No previous lung or mediastinal radiation therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No plans for concomitant antineoplastic therapy (including standard fractionated RT, chemotherapy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy).
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and hypothyroidism. He smokes 1 pack per day for 40 years and consumes 5-6 beers per week.
